Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Amphibian defense peptide. May have antimicriobial activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: D-amino acid (D-methionine) at M2 and Amidation (Aspartic acid 1-amide) at D7.

Literature.Title: Peptidomic dissection of the skin secretion of Phasmahyla jandaia (Bokermann and Sazima, 1978) (Anura, Hylidae, Phyllomedusinae).
Literature.Author: Rates B, Silva LP, Ireno IC, Leite FS, Borges MH, Bloch C Jr, De Lima ME, Pimenta AM.
